Ingredients.3: 1 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast, finely chopped

Ingredients.9: 1 tablespoon red curry paste (such as Thai Kitchen®)

Ingredients.12: 0.5 (16 ounce) package egg roll wrappers (such as Nasoya®)

Directions.1: Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil and 1 tablespoon soy sauce in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add chicken and cook until no longer pink, 3 to 5 minutes. Add cabbage, onion, and carrot; cook, stirring occasionally, until softened.

Directions.2: Mix remaining soy sauce, mayonnaise, curry powder, curry paste, garlic, and chile powder together in a bowl. Fold into the chicken mixture.

Directions.3: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Lightly brush a rimmed baking sheet with some olive oil.

Directions.4: Place about 1/4 cup of the chicken mixture diagonally across an egg roll wrapper. Fold the bottom half over the chicken mixture; fold in sides and roll up like a burrito. Repeat until all the chicken mixture and wraps have been used.

Directions.5: Place egg rolls seam-side down on the prepared baking sheet. Brush tops and sides of the rolls with remaining olive oil.

Directions.6: Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 10 to 12 minutes.
